chargeHist.descr: Possess Drug Paraphernalia to Manufacture, Compound, Convert, Produce, or Store Methamphetamine
Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 

COURT ORDERS: In 15CF864 on COUNT 1>4 YEARS PRISON (1 yr IC/3 yrs ES) to run CONCURRENT to each other and any sentence deft is currently serving; CONDITIONS OF ES: A/T/C as deemed appropriate by agent; AODA and follow up; Absolute sobriety; FTW/School; CC; DNA sample and surcharge;

In 15CF124 on COUNT 2>5 YEARS PRISON (2 ys IC/3 yrs ES); CONDITIONS OF ES: A/T/C as deemed appropriate by agent; AODA and follow up; Absolute sobriety; FTW/School; CC; 

In 15CF326 on COUNT 1>4 YEARS PRISON (2 yrs IC/2 yrs ES); CONDITIONS OF ES: A/T/C as deemed appropriate by agent; AODA and follow up; Absolute sobriety; FTW/School; CC; 

In 15CF326 on COUNT 2>5 YEARS PRISON (2 yrs IC/3 Yrs ES); CONDITIONS OF ES: A/T/C as deemed appropriate by agent; AODA and follow up; Absolute sobriety; FTW/School; CC; 

In 15CF326 on COUNT 4>2 YEARS PRISON (1 yr IC/1 yr ES) CONDITIONS OF ES: A/T/C as deemed appropriate by agent; AODA and follow up; Absolute sobriety; FTW/School; CC; 

COURT notes deft has 135 days in 15CF864 & 296 days in 15CF124 & 15CF326 ; Deft is eligible for SAP.
